aboutMeText1: Hi there, I'm NGUYEN VAN HOA, a Full-stack Developer with a passion for building high-performance, secure, and scalable web applications. With diverse project experience, I am confident in my skills to design architecture, develop, and optimize application performance from frontend to backend.
aboutMeText2: I am a dedicated team player, always eager to learn, collaborate, and driven by results. I believe that a combination of solid technical skills and a problem-solving mindset will help me contribute to the success of any project.
address: Trung Kinh Street, Yen Hoa Ward, Hanoi City, Vietnam

exp84SoftResp5: Improve application performance and resolve technical issues.
